alert.note: Alert for Colquitt; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:58AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Grady, Thomas and southwestern Colquitt Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 857 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomasville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Enon, Merrillville, Chastain, Quality, Murphy, Akridge, Grady Co A/p, Autreyville, Patten, Eason, Spence and Dawesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
